resources.string: Our goal is to learn and predict which geo
Automatically download attachments for incoming emails
Only download attachments when manually requested
You are unlikely to have coronavirus
If you develop any of these symptomes, report them on this app and book a free test. Only get a test if you have coranavirus symptoms.

Your symptoms suggest you may have coronavirus. Please isolate yourself and anyone else in your household. That means staying at home with no visitors. You should also book a free test immediately. If you are under 18, you are advised to show this message to a trusted adult.
Please stay at home to keep yourself and others safe.
This means that you feel hot to touch on your chest or back - you don\'t need to measure your temparature with a thermometer.
This means coughing a lot for more than an hour, or three or more coughing episodes in 24 hours (if you usually have a cough, it may be worse then usual).
This means you have noticed that you cannot smell or taste anything, or that things smell or taste different to normal.
